title: Two Sum
prompt: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to the target.

title: Valid Parentheses
prompt: Given a string s containing just the characters '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']', determine if the input string is valid.

title: Merge Two Sorted Lists
prompt: Merge two sorted linked lists and return it as a new sorted list.

title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
prompt: Find the maximum profit from buying and selling one stock.

title: Maximum Subarray
prompt: Find the contiguous subarray with the largest sum.

title: Product of Array Except Self
prompt: Return an array such that each element is the product of all elements except itself.

title: Group Anagrams
prompt: Group anagrams from a list of strings.

title: Top K Frequent Elements
prompt: Return the k most frequent elements in an array.

title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
prompt: Find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

title: Course Schedule
prompt: Determine if you can finish all courses given prerequisites.

title: Search in Rotated Sorted Array
prompt: Search a target in a rotated sorted array.

title: Minimum Window Substring
prompt: Find the minimum window substring that contains all characters of another string.

title: Word Ladder
prompt: Return the shortest transformation sequence from beginWord to endWord.

title: Trapping Rain Water
prompt: Calculate how much water can be trapped after raining.

title: Merge k Sorted Lists
prompt: Merge k sorted linked lists into one sorted list.

title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
prompt: Find the median of two sorted arrays.

title: Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
prompt: Return the level order traversal of a binary tree.

title: Lowest Common Ancestor of a Binary Tree
prompt: Find the lowest common ancestor of two nodes in a binary tree.

title: Number of Islands
prompt: Count the number of islands in a 2D grid.

title: Clone Graph
prompt: Clone an undirected graph where each node contains a label and a list of its neighbors.
